story.description:
Implement HAIAMM Policy & Compliance (PC) practice at Level 1 maturity.

## Practice Overview

**Function:** Governance
**Purpose:** Establish policies and ensure regulatory compliance

## Level 1 Objectives

Establish basic AI usage policies and regulatory awareness.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Acceptable Use Policy documented
  - Data handling guidelines
  - Approved AI systems list
  - Prohibited uses defined

- [ ] Regulatory requirements identified
  - EU AI Act applicability assessed
  - Industry regulations mapped (HIPAA, PCI, etc.)
  - Data privacy implications documented

- [ ] Incident reporting process defined
  - Reporting contacts identified
  - Required information documented
  - Response expectations set

- [ ] Third-party AI policy created
  - Approved vendors list
  - Data sharing restrictions
  - Approval process for new tools

## Definition of Done

- [ ] All acceptance criteria met
- [ ] Policies published and accessible
- [ ] Stakeholders notified
- [ ] Compliance gaps documented

## OWASP Risks Addressed

- LLM06: Excessive Agency
- ASI09: Human-Agent Trust Exploitation

## Resources

- [PC Practice Guide](https://github.com/R3v3rzk1mur4/HAIAMM/docs/practices/PC-Processes-OnePager.md)

## Verifhai Integration

Use `/verifhai-practice PC` for guided implementation assistance.
